ProductOfferingPriceRelationship.description: Describes a non-composite relationship between product offering prices. For example one price might be an discount alteration for another price.

href.description: hyperlink reference of the associated product offering price

id.description: Unique identifier of the associated product offering price

name.description: Name of the associated product offering price

relationshipType.description: type of the relationship, for example override, discount, etc.
